[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero – Split” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#1e4a75″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ border_width_left=”30px” border_color_left=”#1c3f68″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#BED8CB” text_font_size=”21px” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#bed8cb” header_letter_spacing=”1px” background_layout=”dark” width=”400px” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”80%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”125px||125px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Services

How we’re uniquely prepared to help

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-header.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Where experience and vision meet

JCG is passionate about working with firms to discover new levels of success through our experience, hard work, and inspired thinking. From business valuation to succession, we offer a broad range of services to benefit every facet of your business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Blurb Grid” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#F0F0F0″ border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Mergers and Acquisitions Consulting ” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/sell-my-business.png” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

We connect well-prepared sellers with pre-approved buyers. And with the industry’s largest database of qualified prospects, we guarantee maximum results because this is what we do every day.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQyODQifX0=@” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Consulting Services” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-consulting-services.svg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s become strategic partners and create superior operating performance in your business. Our wide range of consulting services is designed to deliver the highest enterprise value possible.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0MjkifX0=@” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#F0F0F0″ border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Performance Tracker” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/performance-tracker.png” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Harness the complete customer experience management survey and sales analysis tool that evaluates your staff and financial performance, streamlines your success plans and dramatically improves your bottom line. 

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ1NDQifX0=@” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”50px||50px||true|false” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#F0F0F0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Accounting & Financial Management” image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/accounting.png” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font_size=”20px” body_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” width=”400px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||25px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” animation=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Not only do we know numbers, we know the profession. Our benchmarking, trend spotting, and reporting services are designed to help you make better decisions for your business.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQyNzIifX0=@” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 0%|rgba(30,74,117,0.92) 100%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
